description: Variation of conditions 2 and 3 of planning permission dated 14 April 2023 (RN: 23/01301/FULL) which removed condition 30 of planning permission dated 19th April 2022 (RN: 21/01858/FULL) for the Variation of conditions 2 and 3 of planning permission dated 27 October 2015 (RN: 15/04113/FULL) which itself varied condition 13 (tables and chairs) of planning permission dated 07 February 2003 (RN:02/03540) for Part demolition / redevelopment to provide new buildings, part alterations/extensions (including listed building) to provide 36 flats, 2 live-work units, retail, restaurant facilities and 34 parking spaces in basement with associated works from RN:21/01858/FULL. NAMELY, to allow the use 110 Westbourne Grove as Class E and to sell pre prepared cold food and hot and cold drinks for consumption off the premises.
